title: Calories in Soda Crackers
meta_description: Learn calories in soda crackers per 100 g, including carbs, sodium, protein, fat breakdown, and simple tweaks for your snack.
assumptions: Standard plain baked soda crackers (saltines), no toppings or added fats; based on average commercial brands.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, and portion size. Values are approximate; consult packaging for precise details.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of soda crackers provides 418 kcal, mainly from carbs with high sodium content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Topped with 1 oz (28 g) cheddar cheese

faqs.q: How many calories in one soda cracker?
faqs.a: About 17 kcal per cracker (based on ~4 g each).

faqs.q: Are soda crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1115 mg sodium per 100 gâ€”watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in soda crackers?
faqs.a: 74 g total carbs per 100 g, with 3.9 g fiber and minimal sugars.

faqs.q: How much protein do soda crackers have?
Calories in a typical serving of soda crackers?
faqs.a: A standard serving of 5 crackers (~15 g) has about 63 kcal.
